Shifting Charge.name: Shifting Charge
Shifting Charge.flavor: Brandishing your weapon, you charge forward, dashing among your enemies before they can react.
Shifting Charge.effect: Before the attack, you shift your speed.

Orien Unbound.name: Orien Unbound
Orien Unbound.flavor: Your Mark of Passage flares, and you teleport away from your bonds.
Orien Unbound.effect: You end any immobilized or marked effects on you. You then teleport your speed.

Flurry of Teleportation.name: Flurry of Teleportation
Flurry of Teleportation.flavor: You blink from place to place on the battle field, stabbing a foe before disappearing again.
Flurry of Teleportation.effect: You teleport 4 squares and then make a secondary attack.
Flurry of Teleportation.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Flurry of Teleportation.tertiaryTarget: One creature other than the primary and secondary targets
